SR Class

Definition

Represents an auto-generated resource class. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

In this Article

public class SR
Inheritance
Object
SR

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Constructors

SR()

Initializes a new instance of the SR class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public SR ();

Fields

CalendarAdapterFirstPrompt

A string that provides the text for the first prompt. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterFirstPrompt;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Calendar".

CalendarAdapterOptionChooseDate

A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select a date. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterOptionChooseDate;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Choose a date".

CalendarAdapterOptionChooseMonth

A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select a month. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterOptionChooseMonth;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Choose a month".

CalendarAdapterOptionChooseWeek

A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select a week. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterOptionChooseWeek;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Choose a week".

CalendarAdapterOptionEra

A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select an era. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterOptionEra;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Select an era:".

CalendarAdapterOptionPrompt

A string that provides the text that prompts the user to select an option. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterOptionPrompt;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Select an option:".

CalendarAdapterOptionType

A string that provides the text that prompts the user to enter a date. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterOptionType;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Type a date".

CalendarAdapterTextBoxErrorMessage

A string to use as an error message if the date entered was incorrect. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string CalendarAdapterTextBoxErrorMessage;

Remarks

The value of this string is "The date entered was incorrect".

ChtmlImageAdapterDecimalCodeExpectedAfterGroupChar

A string to use as an error message if the expected decimal code is not present. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string ChtmlImageAdapterDecimalCodeExpectedAfterGroupChar;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Decimal code is expected after the group picture character".

ChtmlPageAdapterRedirectLinkLabel

A string that provides the text for the redirect link label. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string ChtmlPageAdapterRedirectLinkLabel;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Continue".

ChtmlPageAdapterRedirectPageContent

A string containing the message to display preceding a link that redirects the browser to another page. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string ChtmlPageAdapterRedirectPageContent;

Remarks

The value of this string is " Click the following link to continue".

ControlAdapterBasePagePropertyShouldNotBeSet

A string to use as an error message if an attempt is made to set the stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ControlAdapter.Page* property of a ControlAdapter object. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string ControlAdapterBasePagePropertyShouldNotBeSet;

Remarks

The value of this string is "The set method of Page property is not expected to be called directly. It should be overridden by subclasses".

FormAdapterMultiControlsAttemptSecondaryUI

A string to use as an error message if multiple controls are set to appear across a MobilePage object's secondary pages. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string FormAdapterMultiControlsAttemptSecondaryUI;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Multiple controls attempting secondary UI".

MobileTextWriterNotMultiPart

A string to use as an error message if an attempt to write a multipart document is made. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string MobileTextWriterNotMultiPart;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Target does not support multipart documents".

ObjectListAdapter_InvalidPostedData

A string to use as an error message if invalid data was posted for the current ObjectList control's stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ViewMode* property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string ObjectListAdapter_InvalidPostedData;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. (The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"

WmlMobileTextWriterBackLabel

A string that provides the text for the Back label. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlMobileTextWriterBackLabel;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Back".

WmlMobileTextWriterGoLabel

A string that provides the text for the Go label. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlMobileTextWriterGoLabel;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Go".

WmlMobileTextWriterOKLabel

A string that provides the text for the OK label. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlMobileTextWriterOKLabel;

Remarks

The value of this string is "OK".

WmlObjectListAdapterDetails

A string that provides a title for details. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlObjectListAdapterDetails;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Details".

WmlPageAdapterMethod

A string that provides a title for methods. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlPageAdapterMethod;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Method:".

WmlPageAdapterPartialStackTrace

A string that provides a title for the partial stack trace. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlPageAdapterPartialStackTrace;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Partial Stack Trace:".

WmlPageAdapterServerError

A string that provides a common phrase for announcing errors. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlPageAdapterServerError;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Server Error in {0}".

WmlPageAdapterStackTrace

A string that contains the title of the stack trace. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string WmlPageAdapterStackTrace;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Stack Trace:".

XhtmlCssHandler_IdNotPresent

A string to use as an error message if there is no style sheet ID present in the query string. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string XhtmlCssHandler_IdNotPresent;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Style sheet id not present in query string".

XhtmlCssHandler_StylesheetNotFound

A string to use as an error message if a style sheet was not found. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string XhtmlCssHandler_StylesheetNotFound;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Style sheet id not present in query string".

XhtmlMobileTextWriter_CacheKeyNotSet

A string to use to advise calling the stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetCacheKey* method before getting the stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.CacheKey* property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string XhtmlMobileTextWriter_CacheKeyNotSet;

Remarks

The value of this string is "You must call SetCacheKey before getting the CacheKey".

XhtmlMobileTextWriter_SessionKeyNotSet

A string to use to advise calling the stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SetSessionKey* method before getting the stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.SessionKey* property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string XhtmlMobileTextWriter_SessionKeyNotSet;

Remarks

The value of this string is "You must call SetSessionKey before getting the SessionKey".

XhtmlObjectListAdapter_InvalidPostedData

A string to use as an error message if invalid data was posted for the current ObjectList control's stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ViewMode* property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

public const string XhtmlObjectListAdapter_InvalidPostedData;

Remarks

The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. (The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"
